opendial.bn.distribs

Class UtilityTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • opendial.bn.distribs.UtilityTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UtilityFunction

    public class UtilityTable
extends java.lang.Object
implements UtilityFunction
    Utility table that is empirically constructed from a set of samples. The table is defined via a mapping from assignment to utility estimates.
    Version:
    $Date:: 2014-11-15 00:14:12 #$
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)

        Returns:
